question: Which of the following was entrusted the task of drafting Congress Inquiry Committee report on Jallianwala Bagh Massacre?
explanation: Mahatma Gandhi was entrusted the task of drafting Congress Inquiry Committee report on Jallianwala Bagh Massacre. The Jallianwala Bagh massacre, also known as the Amritsar massacre, took place on 13 April 1919.
